src_text: Quande un gruppo piccin de ëse viventi (unna popolaçion picciña) a se separa da-a popolaçion prinçipâ da-a quæ o ne vëgne (comme se se mescian traverso unna cadeña de monti ò un sciumme, ò se se mescian in sce unna neuva isoa, de mainea da no poei vegnî in derê de lengê) s'attrovian de spesso int'un ambiente despægio da quello dond'ean avanti.
ref_text: When a small group of living things (a small population) gets separated from the main population that they came from (like if they move over a mountain range or a river, or if they move to a new island so that they can't easily move back) they will often find themselves in a different environment than they were in before.

src_text: O scaffonlding o no l’è un metodo de imprendimento, ma ciutòsto un aggiutto ch’o fornisce un arrembo a-e persoñe che son apreuvo à affrontâ unna neuva esperiensa de imprendimento, comme l’utilizzo de un neuvo programma de computer, ò l’iniçio de un neuvo progetto.
ref_text: Scaffolding is not a method of learning but rather an aid that provides support to individuals whom are undergoing a new learning experience such as using a new computer program or beginning a new project.
hyp_text: The scaffolding is not a method of entrepreneurship, but rather a tool that provides a boost to people who are about to embark on a new entrepreneurial experience, such as the use of a new computer program, or the start of a new project.

[Ligurian]: De zöne che in giornâ forman parte do Belgio in tempo favan parte do Lussemburgo, ma son diventæ belghe apreuvo a-a rivoluçion belga di anni ’30 de l’Euttoçento.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.

[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.

prompt:

[Ligurian]: Into corso di secoli e gente gh’an edificou con cua de fasce in sciô paisaggio aspio e rapido, fin a-e scuggee che s’avansan in sciô mâ.

[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Ligurian]: De zöne che in giornâ forman parte do Belgio in tempo favan parte do Lussemburgo, ma son diventæ belghe apreuvo a-a rivoluçion belga di anni ’30 de l’Euttoçento.
